data.name: CreateOfficeAssignmentPlan1
CreateOfficeAssignmentPlan2
ReadOffice
data.value: select top(1) OFFICE_ID, OFF_OFFICE from CKT_OFFICE where OFFICE_ID = @officeId

data.name: ReadOfficeAssignmentPlan
data.value: select top(1) OFF_GENERATED_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, ASSIGNMENT_TYPE, CNTY_ASSGNMNT_IND, ALPHA_ASSGNMNT_IND, FNCTN_ASSGNMNT_IND, PRGRM_ASSGNMNT_IND, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TSTAMP, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATD_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TRIBUNAL_IND from CKT_OFCE_ASGMT_PLN where (@offGeneratedId = OFF_GENERATED_ID) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) and (ASSIGNMENT_TYPE = @assignmentType)
